website_summaries.verdict: You'll save both space and an awful lot of money with the Fujifilm FinePix SL1000's 50x captive zoom lens. Image quality could be better, but with a fairly healthy selection of manual controls -- plus raw image shooting -- it's a good choice for the more ambitious novice looking to hone their skills on a budget.

customer_reviews.title: It's a terrific camera for people who are serious photographers but don't feel the need to pack a case of extra lenses around.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The ease of use; the tilting viewscreen; the convenience of a single lens; the incredible zoom; I love it. I'm an artist first, and I like having the preset functions at my fingertips. But I'm also a photographer, and like the option to set up my shots manually. The camera is a little bigger than I thought it would be, but I've used it now for almost four years and I still love it. It's great for nature photography and also for portraits. And both the macro and zoom features are fantastic. I would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase Fujifilm Fine Pix digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pre-own Fujifilm Pix digital at a great price. I bought this camera due to the fact that I bought one 10 years and it finally gave out. This one works fine and I know exactly how it works without the manual. I also received Adata SD HC 32 GB memory card with the camera. As far as I am concern, this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lomai TX

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I like simple. This camera is very simple to use. My teenage son used the camera the other night to take pictures of the eclipse of the moon, and the pictures turned out great. He had never used the camera before and was able to take great shots of the red moon. I use the camera mainly for videoing my son's wrestling matches. The camera takes excellent videos at 60 fps, which makes it easy to view in slow motion for review with his coach. I can video his matches from the stands because of the tremendous 50X optical zoom capability of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fuji camera
customer_reviews.text: I tried several other cameras, Fuji as well as Nikon, trying to find a 14-16MP with a view finder plus the 30-50X telescopic lense but still be able to get great close-ups with out having a camera that was complicated and too heavy to hold still. This is one had met all of those requirements and prayerfully this one will be my go-to camera for many years. I been using a Fuji S700 for almost 7 years but the quality of the photos were not what I wanted. The price is reasonable and it is a great camera for those of us who like to take photos but are not professionals.
customer_reviews.author: batyahTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Professional point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Ths is a great camera! The vendor was very helpful. There is in fact a load more featurs/functins available than I expect to use...but one never knows. Already the camera selection to have both screen and view finder has proved to be correct in the bright Florida sunlight. Good to hold for shooring, although a mite large for general carrying, but accept that as a by-product of the huge magnification.
customer_reviews.author: David Longley

customer_reviews.title: Holly falshdrives Batman!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an update for my fuji 9600/9100. Wholly crap, this thing rocks. Does everything the 9100 does but automatically! The 50 power zoom is not to be believed. First night went outside to look at a full moon. Is was less than the size of a dime at arms length. Let it go full auto and full zoom. Damn! I now use one of the shots as my desktop background. Don't forget to get an extra sd-card as the internal memory s really small. Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Mister C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a more light-weight option when traveling. We just returned from two weeks in Nepal where we trekked through the foothills of the Himalaya and then ventured down to Chitwan National Park for an elephant safari through the jungle. The camera was very portable and easy to use and the pictures I took, even on the AUTO mode, were outstanding. I am still amazed by the camera's performance. I would highly recommend this camera for a more convenient option when on rigorous trips.
customer_reviews.author: Ken N

customer_reviews.title: Reach out and touch something!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for the price. The zoom makes it very versatile for any situation. Sure the sensor may be a bit on the small end, but the ability to get the long shots makes me choose it over my DSLR at times. I got some really neat pics of a lunar eclipse with this that are literally out of this world! I've attached some of the cooler pics I've snapped with it.
customer_reviews.author: JoshTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: ... her trip to Mexico this past spring and she loved this camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mother for her trip to Mexico this past spring and she loved this camera. She was at first intimidated by it due to its size but it was very easy to use and she took some great pictures. She is not a professional photographer but she stated how she was able to get some pictures with this camera other people were not able to. It performed much above her expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: I think its GREAT..
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for awhile now... I think its GREAT ... and 100% worth the money. I'm no professional...and don't know all the ins and outs... but this thing has been super impressive for my personal use. My daughter in law has an expensive camera (I think she gave almost ...or just over $1000 for hers) and this camera is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: duke

customer_reviews.title: What great camera for Fuji's first digital s.l.r type camera!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised how the zoom feature help up its claim. The LCD screen is pretty cool, being, one of the best features on the camera. I was enjoy the panorama mode, as well the wide angle features. The best I'd say on the camera is the hotshoe witch allows you put a dedicated flash unit on top, giving the camera a full look of a standard s.l.r I plan to use this as a temporary start up for my business, until I purchase the rebel t.i 3 from cannon.
customer_reviews.author: velly

customer_reviews.title: we are completely satisfied. It takes great pictures indoors and in outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: As our first upgrade from tiny, point and shoot cameras, we are completely satisfied. It takes great pictures indoors and in outdoor daylight. It seems to handle motion pretty well and is easy enough to set up. I found some of the selection buttons on the camera body to be a bit fiddly, requiring multiple presses to select or accidentally pressing one because there are several, very close to each other but I blame that on fat fingers as much as the camera itself. Do go through the menu and check the default settings. We picked up a very large memory card as part of a package deal so I set the image quality / resolution to the maximum.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Z

customer_reviews.title: wonderful camera great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this camera for 2 days. but so far I am loving it. great price. I am just an amateur who loves taking pictures. I live in an area with a lot of wildlife so the zoom was the selling point for me but I love the different effects you can do with this camera. having fun. I will update my review after a bit of time with it.
customer_reviews.author: adkdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix SL1000
customer_reviews.text: A number of years ago I had a FinePix S5000. I am very happy with the SL1000. There is one feature I enjoy the most. You can take a picture then edit it via the "crop" feature. This allows you to zoom in on the picture taken and then take a second picture. Your first picture will remain as is. A wonderful feature especially if you want to get closer views from your original picture. Needless to say the zoom on the camera is exceptional. The camera feels comfortable to hold and the weight of the camera is not an issue. Wonderful camera. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mcguine

customer_reviews.title: I like the camera because I can either use the eye ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera because I can either use the eye piece if there is glare or use the screen. You need a tripod when using the the zoom or the image gets very blurry. You cannot remove the lens and change to another one . I wish Fugifilm Co. made a more attractive camera bag. the black is hard to see in the car. I would like a more colorful option.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for Beginner
customer_reviews.text: What I like: Great zoom lens Great for shooting in low light Manual, Aperture, shutter priority modes Has a nice viewfinder What I don't like: Too heavy Not many F stops-not able to get a blurred background or nice bokeh image with this lens No manual focus Continuous shooting is horrible in this camera Had it since august of 2013. Selling to get an interchangeable lens camera and a less heavy camera.
customer_reviews.author: mariceli

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: After just reading the paper booklet, I was able to start using it. My husband has read the download booklet and it contains much more info. He loves it more than I do! He has recorded our grandsons flag football game: Also used video for slow motion for hummingbird footage. It takes crystal clear pics in HD. He has it mounted on a tripod right now. He keeps telling me how much he loves it, so I made a good choice. He will be doing 3D soon! We highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: granny 1

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: This camera is more than i expected for my money. it takes video, can zoom during a video. has an incredible zoom that is pretty clear. it is easy to operate and comes with a recharge battery. i think for the money its the best i've found.
customer_reviews.author: TaraDCarey

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy Camera with Great Features
customer_reviews.text: I've used this camera ever since attending a One Direction concert. It made the concert so memorable because of the hi def recording feature. The pictures all turned out wonderful. It's an easy camera to use and I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Deelybop

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far...
customer_reviews.text: I seems to take beautiful pictures but I won't really know how good it is until spring comes and I can get out a take a lot more shots. I do have a problem with the viewfinder (the one you look through) - it's not very bright so it's hard to see what I'm trying to photograph when I'm outside in the sun. I do really enjoy the long zoom lens, though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: For the money the camera is amazing, the picture won't have the clarity of high cost dslr but you can't beat the price and what you get. This is a good company and I did a lot of research comparing many different cameras that are withing the price range of 200-350, this is value and zoom is amazing. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I am an avid photographer and I ...
customer_reviews.text: After plenty of review shopping I found this. Love it! I am an avid photographer and I wanted an easy to use SL camera that has great operating options and beautiful pictures!! Can't wait to take it to Italy with me.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its my first high end (for me) camera. I took some pics recently in the auto mode and they came out great. Even in low light and setting sun, the pics were very clear. There are lot of modes you can play with. I myself have yet to experiment with all of them, but my initial feel is that the camera is very good for its value. The zoom is excellent, best feature I think.
customer_reviews.author: Pranab N. Jha

customer_reviews.title: Filter Adapter Ring for SL1000
customer_reviews.text: Anyone thinking of getting this camera be warned that it does not have an accessory threads for filters. I found a Filter Adapter Ring here on Amazon for this camera that allows me to use 58mm Filters. I have it attached to the end of the lens and it works great. I have added a 58mm UV Filter to it to help protect the lens and it does cut the UV Radiation of scenic photos. Here's the link -  I have a collection of Cokin Filters from my Film Camera days in photography and I wanted to use them with this camera and now I can.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cates - sun27sag15

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best digital cameras
customer_reviews.text: No too an expert on cameras but I used one like this to shoot a video for YouTube and the quality is excellent, I later got a canon that was not as good as the Xl1000, the display feature it's probably the best, you can take pictures to the moon without having to bent or twist your neck by pulling out the display the way you want it, the 60X lens is great but a little bit noisy
customer_reviews.author: M2560

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: This camera is lightweight and easy to handle. While traveling, it gives you a lot of versatility with such an incredible zoom that other photographers are envious. The controls are very user friendly and maneuvering the various functions is straight forward and not confusing at all. I'm glad that I shopped and compared cameras because I absolutely love this Fujifilm!
customer_reviews.author: S. Foster

customer_reviews.title: I get great results from this camera
customer_reviews.text: I get great results from this camera. Although I do not use it as much as I used my smaller point and shoot as it is bulky and not as easy to tag along.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: so so bridge camera
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this superzoom camera is appealing but so far the images are grainy. Further, I think I would prefer to manually zoom rather than electronically zoom. Might want to upgrade to the the HS50exr.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I loved it and so did some thief :'''(
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and so did some thief :'''( So many features in in one unit. Great quality pictures at distance and up close. I tried to buy another but was discontinued and wound up with an S-1 which is also awesome and weather proof
customer_reviews.author: james dwiggins

customer_reviews.title: Best bridge camera Yet
customer_reviews.text: Would appreciate this camera more if the zoom lens had a manual focus feature. The switches to move the zoom are not as smooth as if manually set. Otherwise love the hot shoe, the 50 - l optical wide to telephoto lens, the new automatic lens settings, the panorama feature, and the smaller size. Wonder if the optional flash unit is a dedicated flash that is controlled by the various automatic lens settings. Or, is the flash synch.d. only at certain shutter speeds??
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great camera from Fuji
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid amateur photographer who spends most of my free time in my kayak. I always take a camera because you never know when nature will bless you with an opportunity. I have had the 18x, 30x and now the Sl1000 50x and have been extremely pleased with quality in all these Fuji cameras. The Sl1000 is truly an amazing camera with a zoom equivalent to a 1200mm SLR lens. The cost is reasonable and try and get something comparable for the price and quality. You won't find it. Aces all around Fuji. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! images clear, vibrant, accurate! zoom apperciated. Great feel to the camera. Reviews helped me decide.
customer_reviews.text: First the product feels very good in the hands. Solid, well built but not extra heavy. Macro, super macro, excellent photographs. Doesn't take an inordinately amount of time to master almost all features. Buy extra batteries and an extra 64Gb card and you'll spend next winter creating fantastic slide shows and presentations with crisp clear photos and enjoyable video. Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: FB from Ann Arbor, Mi

customer_reviews.title: The SL-1000 is just a great bridge camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for novice to advance amateur. It is part point & shoot, and part DSLR. The controls are laid out nice and easy to use. The big owners manual is easy to read and reference. I really enjoy taking pictures with this camera. Plus, I think Fujifilm has the best web support for their camera's and customers. Web pages are easy to use and find what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: TimJSch310

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this camera, it takes GREAT pictures and the zoom is fantastic I bought this to take pictures of a new grandson and the shots are great, I've blown them up to 8x11 and the detail is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: jerry1s

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome! I was a little worried about battery life after reading the reviews but have not had a problem with it dying too quick .. and it takes awesome pictures! Very nice and would totally recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandidee

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have found the product to be very good, and easy to use. The ability to take still photographs while a video is recording is an excellent feature, and has been very useful. I am still learning, but well satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Everything works as expected and the pictures are quite good. Still learning all of the functionality and will ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding camera so far. Everything works as expected and the pictures are quite good. Still learning all of the functionality and will update as we go along.
customer_reviews.author: The Wordman

customer_reviews.title: Great Video and Good In Low Light No Need To ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Video and Good In Low Light No Need To Carry Era Lenses Use Tipod Or Shooting Stick For Best Resulys
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera, had it about 3 years and it is perfect.Really good battery life
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: This camera is so awesome, I had to buy one of these for ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so awesome, I had to buy one of these for my work. It takes great up close photos plus great action shoots. Both my kids play sports and we have lots of action shoots to enjoy, The zoom is out of this world. You can take close up shoots of the moon and see the craters. I really love the instant zoom function.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Leydig

customer_reviews.title: Fuji FinePix SL 1000 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: There has not been a chance to really put it to the test, but I am not worried. I steady tripod is a MUST for longer focal lengths. Raising the ISO also helps. Am happy with the purchase. Bjoerlng Idolater
customer_reviews.author: Bjoerling Idolater

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this camera for close-ups of birds and wild animals, timed photos of groups, etc. Definitely recommend it for anyone who wants a 50X zoom at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: SissyJ

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Replaces my old Kodak that was simulor to this one, easy to use for the basic and above user & has lots of extras for someone that either knows the better cameras or wants to learn
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: SL 1000
customer_reviews.text: I have been shooting Professionally for over 25 years, the SL 1000 makes taking pictures Easy and Fun. I have a SL 8400 and a Cannon too. I use to use a Fuji 901 which I would put up against any Nikon or Cannon, it was way ahead of it's time. The Varsitilly of the Sl 1000 is great, no need to carry Bulky lenses, you've got it all in one.
customer_reviews.author: K-Miru

customer_reviews.title: Panasinic FZ is sharper and clearer than Fujifilm
customer_reviews.text: Panasonic FZ series is so much better. I had high hopes for Fujifilm but they do not compare to the clear and sharp images of Panasonic - even if you go back a few model years.
customer_reviews.author: Aries7007

customer_reviews.title: Nice images, but hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the images but I can't figure out how to use the features. Didn't come with a manual so I downloaded one online and its 175+ pages.. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love it I got it for my husband for his birthday. We're looking forward to taking it on a trip with us. Takes awesome pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy K. Oksen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera and the zoom is fabulous! Great for beginners and for more experienced photographers. Lots of fun features.
customer_reviews.author: CAY

customer_reviews.title: So far, I am loving the camera but not happy with fuji film customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have taken some pictures using the Auto Mode, they are clear and very nice. However, the charger that came with the camera did not work. I called Fuji, to get a replacement. I am responsible for paying for the shipping of the charger, I think that stinks and is poor customer service. I just bought the camera last week and have only been able to use it because I got a charger from another company. I hope this camera lasts!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda V

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality was very bad and it was not crisp
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was very bad and it was not crisp. Perhaps I got a defective piece. So I have returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thought it would be better :/
customer_reviews.text: okay but I thought it would be better sometimes takes photos a bit blurry and has something very strange sometimes tends to take photos and people get their face like a little moved or stretched is really weird but the rest looks good
customer_reviews.author: ysilda perdomo

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Decent bridge camera, lots of features, affordable price. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nintendont

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It has work really good and the quality of the pictures is the best
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera has served me very well for almost two years. Superb lens.
customer_reviews.author: John MA

customer_reviews.title: Great Photo's
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my mother-in-law who love's taken photo's and her old camera the shutter would not work correctly. She love's it the pictures are a lot more crisp even while in action. Only thing is it is a little heavy to carry around all day.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn ward

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, ease of use with all the features usually only found on an SLR cameras twice the price. added a 32gig high speed card.
customer_reviews.author: Mc G

customer_reviews.title: A Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this camera is very good. Well made. Although to date, I haven't had much time to use it. I've been disappointed with some of the pics but that could be my inexperience in using it. I have another Fujifilm camera (S1800) and was always pleased with it's performance. Would recommend this camera to others.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, now I have many happy memories
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at my daughter request as her Christmas present. She loves it and I have LOTS of pictures of my Grandson. It had many of the same features of pricier cameras, but cost about $150 less. Produces high quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This is a great all around super zoom camera with a impressive 24-1200 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all around super zoom camera with a impressive 24-1200 mm zoom. I have gotten some really nice pictures with this camera and I up loaded a few moon pictures to to show its zoom abilty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for a trip to Europe and the quality of the pictures are amazing! I definitely recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Almanzar

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera,especially for the price. We are very happy with the buy.
customer_reviews.author: MMIKE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent camera, it is one of the best in the market
customer_reviews.author: nasim chahine

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Took it on vacation and loved it !!!
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning the camera, but it does everything I have wanted it to! Photos are clear and sharp. Great camera, Great Price!
customer_reviews.author: dpittman414

customer_reviews.title: Better than my sx40 canon
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but decided this is worth writing. I am usually a canon person but have always been open to other brands, I must say I like this Fujifilm sl1000 much better then the canon sx40. The zoom is great have took great pics handheld at full 50 times zoom. Lots of features on this camera. Have owned this for 30 days and have taken several 100 pics with all coming out clear.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is not that great, also not a very good option for low light pictures Since it gives you the better zoom, you cant except the same better in its quality over all a descent product
customer_reviews.author: Harisankar PT

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this camera is awesome it takes awesome pics... the zoom is just wow ive been using fuji cameras for years and this is deff the best one yet ty
customer_reviews.author: gary doberstein

customer_reviews.title: Its just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Well I was hoping for a large Zoom which this camera has without the noise,Sadly Fuji did not put enough thought into this model to reduce the noise even at 100 iso. So I sent it back and maybe next time they will get it right,Had some nice features but noise to me is a deal killer.
customer_reviews.author: R Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Does everithing a camera of this category must do, it's features are equivalent to those of a Canon, a Nikon, a Sony, but it's price is more fair.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Miguel Saraiva Tomczak

customer_reviews.title: very good camera
customer_reviews.text: really it looks like a DSLR camera, but it's much easy to take good phtographs in any situations, the size is ideal, i'm ver happy with my purchas
customer_reviews.author: Álvaro Saldarini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: is better than I expected. probe took him to the moon picture and details of the relief of the moon is excellent. still learning to use all its features. practically is a professional camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo M.

customer_reviews.title: Still in evaluation
customer_reviews.text: So far I like camera. This is the second SL1000 ordered . First returned due to faulty battery or charger. This 2nd charger and battery are responding the same as first shipment. Trying to reach Fuji for additional details on suspected problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It does everything promised and it very user friendly. I did not want an SLR and needed a camera that my wife could "Just pick up and use". The burst (continious) mode was a important feature. The 1000 has an easy acess button to activate this featue.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Wales

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing I keep it in my car and have so many great shots that otherwise would have been missed! Very easy to use Just a great camera LOVE IT LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINE

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for aspiring photographers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but macro setting tends to white out on some macro shots or blur. Could be something I'm doing wrong. Otherwise I love the camera and will be taking it with me on PCT hike for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Casey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the camera easy to use just have one fault can not take sports pictures inside buildings.
customer_reviews.author: Dorene Waid

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good product
customer_reviews.text: The shipping delayed one day, but they refounded me the shipping costs. The camera is exactly what I wanted: simple to use and better than a compact camera, especially because of the super zoom. I recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcio Roberto de Souza

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as she is a beginner in photography. She loves it needless to say. The only issue is the camera has a blotch on the lens that won't come off it was given this way.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this camera is! Beautiful clear pictures. The ease of a point and shoot with lots of fun easy to use gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera - Fujifilm Finepix SL1000
customer_reviews.text: Good alternate for DSLR. Didn't expect this many features in this price. The image quality is really nice 50x Optical Zoom. The only problem is you need to get used to with it. It won't take more than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dipteshkumar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: many excellent features; especially appreciate the electronic vtewfinder which is rapidly disappearing from under $500 cameras.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Walkuski

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera; the zoom is very impressive, at such a price. I recommend every one to buy this product confidently.
customer_reviews.author: Akhan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera!!! Absolutely love it has the best zoom I have every seen. very easy to use not complicated at all and great price is also a plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Montejo

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera
customer_reviews.text: the camera is amazing, i took the most beautiful pictures with it. i'm very happy i bought this wonderful camera
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. An excellent value. Takes good pictures and has numerous options for various circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Seth & Erika Cook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is easy to use if your a beginner and takes awesome pictures, if you are more experienced it allows you to make the photos look the way you want them to easily
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. Well built feels like a premium product. Just a little complicated to find the best picture setting.
customer_reviews.author: lester

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm SL1000
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Takes fantastic images and is impressive in very low light. If you are looking for an inexpensive digital camera with some truly nice features, then consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn D. Durst

customer_reviews.title: 50X zoom and 3D pictures, amazing...
customer_reviews.text: 50X zoom blows me away. Don't know how everything works yet. Haven't gotten to the 3D shots. It's an amazing camera.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera, with nice pictures for an amateur photographer like me. I put it in SR Auto and let it do all the work for me. The zoom is incredible! I just have a little issue with it and I don't know if it's normal or mine has a problem, but when I take the first picture using flash, the second one takes very long to finish (the screen goes blank and after like 10 seconds it shoots). Battery life can last you about 200 pictures (depending on flash use). Bought and 64GB MicroSDXC from SanDisk and it works great using an adapter. That way, I can see the pics taken in my smartphone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: LuisH

customer_reviews.title: Mixed emotions
customer_reviews.text: I need to get used to it but it does not turn on/off easy. Seems "weighty". i miss black n white option other camera had. Menu seems complicated. DOES take nice pics when i finally figure out the setting
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: A learning procees
customer_reviews.text: I have always owned an Olympus camera, but the one I chose to replace my current model was uncomfortable and I tried the SL 1000.. this seems like a great camera, but the instructions booklet is hard to understand... It was written as if you completely understand photography and I am only a novice... The few pictures I have taken were excellent and I think this will be a slow learning process because of the instructions.... I love the camera and wish I could learn how to use it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: john h phelps

customer_reviews.title: Amazing photos!!!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this camera last year, all I can say is it takes AMAZING photos!!! I am a novice and people that see the photos I take if my exotic ducks think I have a professional camera, I use the "auto" setting only and bam, I'm an instant pro!!!! Back when I bought mine is was $500, I would buy this camera 50 times over its just that great.
customer_reviews.author: JoeDale

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly the best camera that you can buy for the money. We bought 3 different ones and took them back because there was something that we didn't like about them. We love it and use it all the time, Just got back from vacation out west and took over 2000 pictures. I do recommend that you purchase a extra battery and the car charger like i did, that why you never run out of life on the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: jerry Cox

customer_reviews.title: true to its promises
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend you visit Fujifilm website to learn all about its spec. The picture quality is very crisp and high. I have canon xti and I have to say that the picture quality is very comparable. Buy it and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Almadani

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix SL1000 16.2MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD (Black)  -  Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a big step up from the versatility and clarity of even the best mobile phone cameras. Biggest complaint is the operator's manual because it's very confusing. The camera itself is pretty straightforward though and even the video function is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Green

customer_reviews.title: So delicate
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, i purchased the first one with a leather bag to protect it but with a little knock down it was totally damaged, now iam taking extra care of my new one , the picture is perfect with detailed zoom and variety of shooting types, LIKE IT
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera about two weeks ago and have just been learning its features, but have already taken some great photos. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone, from beginners to pros.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the 50X zoom. The price was about right for this camera
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Not being exceptionally proficient with photography, this camera make you look like a pro with he quality of picture it takes!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Decorde

product_meta.title: Fujifilm FinePix SL1000 16.2MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Great for people that want the features and flexibility of a DSLR outfit but without the weight and hassle. The SL1000 features the newly developed Fujinon optical 50x zoom lens (24 1200mm) which incorporates a combination of a spherical lenses and ED lens. It provides a bright aperture rating of f/2.9 6.5 with 17 elements in 12 groups, the lens combines a spherical and ED elements to good effect for reduced aberration and superior image quality. With Super Macro Mode capturing subjects as close as 1cm from the lens, the FinePix SL1000 seamlessly covers an enormous focal range with no need to ever change lenses. Lens shift image stabilization ensures that even hand held shots are free from blur and Fujifilm's proprietary super resolution technology offers an overwhelming 100x Intelligent Digital Zoom. The 16M BSI CMOS makes even dark scenes bright for high quality images. This sensor offers several advantages over conventional CCD sensors including: Continuous Shooting at 10fps in full resolution (max. 9 frames) and Full HD Movies (1080i/60fps) recorded in H.264 format incorporating both high quality image and small data size. The FinePix SL1000 boasts a high resolution (920K dot) electronic view finder equipped with an eye sensor, making it easier to frame subjects and check focus in bright daylight conditions. The bright EVF accommodates a traditional shooting style, making it easy to steady the camera, even when shooting with the 50x zoom fully extended. The 3.0 inch, 920K dot Wide angle LCD screen tilts to provide flexible viewing options for both high and low shooting positions. A side lever on the lens functions to control the zoom. Adjust the zoom with the left hand and press the shutter with the right. In addition to default JPEG file format, the FinePix SL1000 also offers the option of RAW or RAW + JPEG image formats. SILKYPIX viewer and RAW conversion software is included for effortless management and conversion of RAW image data on your PC.
feature_bullets: 3.0" High Resolution (920k Dot) Tilt LCD and 920k Dot EVF
